alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHICKASAW...SOUTHEASTERN PONTOTOC...ITAWAMBA... SOUTHERN LEE AND NORTHERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 121 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Littleville to 7 miles northeast of Tremont to near New Wren, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Amory, Fulton, Verona, Okolona, Tombigbee State Park, Shannon, Plantersville, Mantachie, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Houlka, Evergreen, Clay, Nettleton, New Houlka, Hatley and Abney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
